Room.Name: The Barbarian Training Pits
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the Barbarian Training Pits, where the barbarians test the skills and powers of their kind in mortal combat.
Room.LongDescription: The barbarian tribes do not like to promote their own kind without some proof of their worthiness to live up to the barbarian codes of battle, those being kill, maim, destroy. If you wish to advance to the level of Tribesman, you should enter the blue hut. If you are already a Tribesman and wish to advance to second class, you should enter the green hut. If you wish to assume the highest ranking of Tribesman, first class, you should enter the red hut.
